mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Houghton, James
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Houghton, James Patient Age: 34. Marital Status: Married. Diagnosis: Gun shot wound right leg near New Market VA. Location Wounded: In act[ion] New Market. Date Wounded: 1864/05/15. Nature of Wound: Conical Ball. Treatment: Description list by J. D Skelburg A. A. Surg. USA. Result: Returned to duty by order of hospital inspecting board.
